name: Island Dash
description: You are controlling the Tourist through the whole Island. Your goal is to collect as much money as quickly as possible, so the Tourist can buy himself a Hotdog. If you are to slow and he runs out of calories, he will die. :( Do you think you can make it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel(r) Core (TM)2 CPU -T7200 @ 2.50 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Mobility Raedon X1600 / Nvidia GeForce 8600M GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Not fully optimized yet
